inclusion.criterion: Age and sex matched group of patients with HCV- related liver cirrhosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Chronic HCV related liver cirrhosis complicated by hepatocellular carcinoma not eligible for treatment
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who refuse to participate in the study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hepatitis B virus, any other causes of cirrhosis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Cancers other than HCC or metastatic liver cancer
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 55-year-old man diagnosed with HCV 2 years ago and recent coinfection with HBV. He is on IFN, RBV and direct antiviral drugs for the past 6 months.
